text: Trataka is a 2018 Indian Kannada film written and directed by Shivaganesh. Trataka is a story about an ACP who suffers from Complex Partial Seizure. His brother is murdered. He has two close friends and a love interest who are helping him in finding the killer. The film has loads of blood and goriness attached to it. Trataka was released on 31 August 2018. == References == Category:Indian films Category:2010s Kannada-language films
title: Trataka (film)
